name: Hoops Madness
summary: The intense physical play, fast-paced action, and many thrilling and fun arcade game modes will leave you breathless as you take over the court in a larger than life arena surrounded by exhilarating sights and sounds that only the pros get to experience. With all sorts of thrilling and fun arcade game modes that you can’t do anywhere else but in Hoops Madness⏤you’ll never want to play in reality again!
